 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁאַן‎</span>] **verb Pa\`lel** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:55d»§ 55d</sup>) ==be at ease or at peace, rest securely== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pacify***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***peace***); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁאֲנַן‎</span> [[Jer.48.11|Jer 48:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> consecutive [[Jer.30.10|Jer 30:10]] +; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁאֲנָ֑נוּ‎</span> [[Job.3.18|Job 3:18]] — ***be at ease, secure***, undisturbed by ill fortune: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁקַט וְשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֵין מַחֲרִיד‎</span> [[Jer.30.10|Jer 30:10]] = [[Jer.46.27|Jer 46:27]]; [[Jer.48.1|Jer 48:1]]l (of Moab); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפַּחַד רָעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Prov.1.33|Prov 1:33]] of rest from trouble, etc., in grave [[Job.3.18|Job 3:18]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאָן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית שְׁאָן‎</span>. P. 112
